techmeme.title: Amazon introduces a Kindle Recaps feature that uses GenAI and moderators to create short summaries of books in a series (Aisha Malik/TechCrunch)
Sources: StubHub, Klarna, eToro, and adtech group MNTN have paused their IPO plans as President Trump's trade war upends the global economy (Fareed Sahloul/Bloomberg)
Analysts say Microsoft, whose shares fell the least among top tech companies, is shielded from the worst tariff impacts due to Azure and a broad enterprise base (Fortune)
Sources: a TikTok deal, which was largely finalized by Wednesday, was put on hold after China indicated it would the reject the deal over Trump's tariffs (Reuters)
The Nasdaq fell 5.8% on the second day following Trump's tariffs announcement, with Nvidia closing down 7.4%, Apple 7.3%, Netflix 6.7%, Meta 5%, and Amazon 4.2% (Todd Spangler/Variety)
